marklogic.body: hmmm.. just wondering where the blood is on Zimmerman's clothes? I thought he had his head bashed in and a broken nose? It is reported that he was 'cleaned up' at the scene but wonder where is the bandage for his broken nose?Â hmmmm I guess in Flordia when they clean you up, they clean your clothes too? I've never had a broken nose, but I wound think that your nose would Bleed onto your clothing, no? By the recent video released by ABC News, Zimmerman doesn't look like someone who was severaly beat ( head bashed into the sidewalk)Â ...by a thug. And that is another point, if Trayon was a thug, as many have 'assumed ' him to be, I'd think that he would have been carrying some type of weapon. I mean, he's a bad guy right? Most bad guys'Â who areÂ up to no good' carry some type of knife or gun or something right?? I guess it was his day Off..
